remarks: Two nonnegative integers are the same if and only if they are divisible by the same prime powers.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 29-Sep-2013.)
statement:
nn0prpw $p |- ( ( A e. NN0 /\ B e. NN0 ) -> ( A = B <-> A. p e. Prime A. n e. NN ( ( p ^ n ) || A <-> ( p ^ n ) || B ) ) ) $.
$d A n p $.
$d B n p $.
